1.content: You, the reader has to choose who you are! So, will you be?
1.title: Who Will you be?

11.content: You ponder who you are, like you lost sight of it after you left the airport for some reason. You want to know what kind of person you are:
11.title: James: what kind of person are you?

choices: You are going to Corgie college?
You are going to West side college?
111.content: You ponder once again what college you went to and what degree you are in? You lost sight of everything after the airport. Or was it an airport? What even is a air port thing? So you think once again:
111.title: A thoughtful person?

12.content: You ponder who you are, like you lost sight of it after you left the airport for some reason. You want to know what kind of person you are:
12.title: Teressa: what kind of person are you?

choices: You are going to Corgie college of journalism?
You are going to Westside college of engineering?
121.content: You ponder once again what college you went to and what degree you are in? You lost sight of everything after the airport. Or was it an airport? What even is a air port thing? So you think once again:
121.title: A considerate person?

1211.content: You go to Corgie college of journalism! Yea that's right! You now remember what your passion is: writing!! But on the other hand you kind of forgot as well how old you are?
1211.title: You are going to Corgie college of journalism?

choices: "where are we? And are we almost to James's house?
"You take forever just take us home please?
"now wonder your old you can't see the road if it smacked you in the face!"
12111.content:
Yesss!!! Yesss!! This is right, you are 19 years old at Corgie college of journalism! But then you remember what you were doing with your friends Lucas, Julles, and James?

Oh yea! You all end up getting their luggage and head to a Uber to get home. The Uber driver helps them with their bags and starts a conversation that is merely useless but important at the same time.
“Oh, hello there, are you James?” The Uber driver, Franklin says.
“Yes, this is James, and these are my friends, Julles, Lucas, and Teressa. We’re currently trying to get home.”
“Oh dear, is your place James, located on Barnies Road?”
“Yes, that’s me!”
“Oh dear, okay we’ll head that way first!”
“Okay sounds good!” James Said.
Franklin drives down the Airport road to get to Jakens road to get James home. He then turns the wrong way and ends up going an alternate route to get him home.
“Oh oopsies dearie! I’m so truly sorry! I’ll get you home alright! Just hang tight you guys!”

You wonder why the hell it's taking so long for the Uber driver to get us all home...
12111.title: You are 19 years old?

choices: "okay just get us all home safely please?"
121111.content: "oh dear, yes we all are almost to the James's residence! Dear!"
121111.title: "where are we? And are we almost to James...

1211111.content:
“Oh, I will dear!”
“Okay” James said.
After awhile James wonders if Franklin is driving to his house or not because it is 12:03 AM on his watch.
“Are you almost to my place yet?” James getting more and more frustrated by the minute.
“Oh, yes dear, I am close.”
Just a few minutes after that, the car bumps over a bump it seems like but there was no bump in the road. Franklin stops the car and says:
“Oh, dear! I must get out and see what might that was! I’m so terribly sorry you guys!”
The whole group gets out and sees a big gash in one of the tires and a dead body under the car. They all look at Franklin in a terribly frightened way.
“oh dear! Oh dear! What might have I done???”
“You just killed someone!” Julles Said in disgust and startled way.
1211111.title: "okay just get us all home safely please?"

info.brief_description: Four friends returning home But get their car tire deflated. What will all of them do?
info.description: Teressa, Lucas, Julles, and James are currently at the airport grabbing their luggage from their terminal after arriving at 10:57 pm from a long vacation and are awaiting to sleep in their own beds.
